actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet

official_title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide for certain transportation and subsistence in cases where district courts are holding special sessions as a result of emergency conditions.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Judiciary Emergency Special Sessions Act of 2005 to require a district court holding special sessions due to emergency conditions to provide for certain prisoner transportation and subsistence allowances.

titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide for certain transportation and subsistence in cases where district courts are holding special sessions as a result of emergency conditions.
